author: eth2_bridge_bot
content:
**CarlBeek**
@svantemand,

BLS standardisation efforts are going well. There was a new hash-to-curve draft released a few days ago (v5: https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-irtf-cfrg-hash-to-curve-05) with some minor tweaks made. It is expected that this will be the final version.

IETF meeting 106 (https://ietf.org/how/meetings/106/) happens 16-22 Nov which should be the last chance for people to raise issues with the spec before it is established as a blockchain standard. So hopefully fairly soon after that point (assuming no issues are raised).
